dct_alternative_sm: Map of the United States : compiled from the most authentic sources.
dct_description_sm: Includes the islands of Cuba, Hispaniola and Jamaica.
Includes insets of North America, New York City, District ofColumbia and Boston.
Includes illustrations of George Washington and the Capitol at Washington.
Includes distance chart and populations for major cities.
dct_rights_sm: This map is in the public domain.
dct_rightsHolder_sm: Please attribute access and use of this digitized map to the Stephen S. Clark Library, University of Michigan Library. https://www.lib.umich.edu/about-us/policies/copyright-policy
